Package io.micronaut.jackson

Class ObjectMapperFactory

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.jackson.ObjectMapperFactory
@Factory public class ObjectMapperFactory extends Object
Factory bean for creating the Jackson ObjectMapper.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
